label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_015
content:
## 2026-01-17 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /zone-transfers: REQUESTS req | p50: 545ms p95: 1275ms p99: N/A | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /dns-queries: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /dnssec-sign: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /health-checks: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /change-management: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 30% | Mem 62% | Disk 76% | Conns: 1262 | Net: 80/110 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 23% | Mem 50% | Disk 57% | Conns: 1065 | Net: 61/78 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 50% | Mem 68% | Disk 52% | Conns: N/A | Net: 98/138 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 34% | Mem 73% | Disk 62% | Conns: N/A | Net: 16/20 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-axfr: active 35 | idle 10 | waiting 2 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 50 | avg_wait: 12ms
- pool-ixfr: active 196 | idle 20 | waiting 5 | exhaustion: 1 | max: 250 | avg_wait: 15ms
- pool-propagation: active 4 | idle 1 | waiting 0 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 10 | avg_wait: 8ms
- pool-signing: active 1 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 2 | avg_wait: 5ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 88.5% | Bandwidth: 2.3 Gbps | Origin requests: 22,000

### Alerts
- [INFO] DNS propagation latency on cloud-dns-sync-01: 66s
- [WARNING] stale answer rate at 0.3%
- [ERROR] bogus validation event in DNSSEC zone signing
- [CRITICAL] N/A

### Deployments & Changes
- Migrated 16 additional zones; added automated check for provider record-set size constraints
- Rotated sync controller secret store entries with version pinning
- Validated DS and DNSKEY alignment for all signed zones
- Documented secret rotation procedures in runbook
- Scheduled next KSK ceremony tabletop exercise

### Events
- Post-bulk-change verification: compared TXT records across 20 external resolvers; stale answer rate returned to baseline
- Migrated 16 zones; introduced automated provider record-set size check
- Rotated sync controller secret store entries with version pinning; documented in runbook
- Validated DS and DNSKEY alignment for all signed zones; scheduled next KSK ceremony tabletop exercise

### On-Call
- Shift: I. Hassan. 1 pages. 5 tickets. Status: Stable; preventive automation added and bulk-change effects resolved.
